mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.RESTART.CONTENT.TEXT: Please restart the software to experience the new version.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.RESTART.CONTENT.TITLE.WIN: An update is finished. Please restart the software to try new features.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.RESTART.CONTENT.TEXT.WIN: To ensure the system stability, you need to start the software manually.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.TITLE: To Update Firmware?
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.CONTENT.TITLE: The firmware does not match the software, so the program may fail to run properly.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.CONTENT.TEXT: It may take one minute to upgrade the firmware. To avoid that the progress is disrupted, please keep your computer running properly and do not work on other operations during the period.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.CONTENT.TEXT.BLE: Please connect your device with the computer with the USB cable. Then upgrade the firmware according to the onscreen instructions. Then upload the program.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.SUCCESS.TITLE: The update is finished.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.SUCCESS.CONTENT.TITLE: The firmware update is finished!
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.SUCCESS.CONTENT.TEXT: Please restart the device for a better experience.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.FAILED.TITLE: Update failed.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.FAILED.CONTENT.TITLE: The firmware update failed again. Please try again.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.FAILED.CONTENT.TIPS: Failed again? Please check if the device is connected in the right way.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.LOADING.TITLE: Updating the firmware...
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.FIRMWARE.LOADING.CONTENT.TEXT: Please do not close the software or do anything with the software.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.PROGRESS.ERROR: Network Connection Error. Please try again later.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.REMIND.TEXT: Remind me when any update is available.
mblock5-i18n.UPDATER.NOT.SUPPORT.UPDATE: The current version does not support auto-update.

mblock5-i18n.CALIBRATE.COLOR.TITLE: Calibrate the color sensor of Codey Rocky
CALIBRATE_COLOR_DESCRIPTION: Put your Codey Rocky in the environment that needs calibration (working environment), and rotate the IR color sensor to the bottom.
Place the white color identification card under the color sensor (if your color card is damaged or lost, use a white printer paper then).
Just click the Calibrate button below. Calibration finished!
Please aim the color sensor to the center of the Color Identification Card.
mblock5-i18n.CALIBRATE.GYRO.TITLE: Calibrate the gyro of Codey
CALIBRATE_GYRO_DESCRIPTION: Put your Codey in a stable place.
Just click the Calibrate button below.Calibration finished!
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.TITLE: Connect Device
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.ONLY.TIP: Only one device can be connected at a time in this version. A new device connection will lead to the disconnection of the existing one.
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.HID.DESCRIPTION:
1. Install the 2.4G module on the robot
2. Power on the robot
3. Press the button at the top of the 2.4G module
4. Connect the 2.4 G module to your computer
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.CHOOSE.BLE: Please select a Bluetooth device to connect
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.LIST.EMPTY: No device can be detected to connect.
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.MESSAGE.FAIL: Connection error. Please try to connect again.
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.HELPLINK.TEXT: Failed to connect? Go to FAQ for help.
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.UNABLE.TITLE: Unidentified device
mblock5-i18n.CONNECT.UNABLE.TEXT:
The device you connected may be not {0}, or the firmware of {0} has been damaged.

	You can: 
	- Change another COM port.
	- Update the device firmware

If you are using a Bluetooth adapter, please check if the adapter is well connected to the device.

ext-i18n/tm.extensionDescription: With Machine Learning, you don’t have to program but still can train computers to learn things and establish artificial neural networks that resemble human’s brains.

ext-i18n/codey_emotion.extensionDescription: [beta]Use the emotion blocks to add new abilities to Codey Rocky. Sometimes it smiles, sometimes it gets naughty. Sometimes it asks you for some care~
